title: I'm a Little Teapot
short_plot_summary: A catchy children's song about a clever little teapot with a spout and a handle who loves to pour out tea.
explanation: A teapot, representing the main character in the song
A pinching hand, illustrating that the teapot is short and stout
Thermometer, symbolizing the teapot getting all steamed up
Shout, symbolizing the teapots shout when water boils
A cup of tea, to be enjoyed after the teapot is poured out
